title: october 8: how the Disney Channel Original Movie became must-see tv
description:
Hi! I’m Maia from mxmtoon and you’re listening to 365 days with mxmtoon. This might not be the exact words from the Disney Channel intros, but you get the point. We all remember nights sitting in front of the TV waiting for Disney to premiere their original movie. They have changed the game in movie making, TV networking, and now having their own streaming platform. In today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares just how Disney Channel got its start with making original movies. Speaking of movie making, Maia shares a specific movie that was a huge flop in theaters, but a hit on Broadway. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
